sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ViewportScroller } from '@angular/common'; @Component({ selector: 'app-projects', templateUrl: './projects.component.html', styleUrls: ['./projects.component.css'] }) export class ProjectsComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private viewPortScroller: ViewportScroller) { } ngOnInit(): void { } public onClick(elementId: string): void{ this.viewPortScroller.scrollToAnchor(elementId); } }

Projects


We have completed several projects with best quality, sharp project management, and priceless dedication of our experts. View a list of the projects we finished for the public and private sectors across different industries.

Would you like to start a project with us?

Mekdela Amba University

Project deliverable: Network Infrastructure Upgrade, Microsoft Teams, and Zoom Licensing

Project Size: 1M+ ETB

Project deliverable: Video Conferencing

Project Size: 1M+ ETB

Project Size: 1M+ ETB

Project deliverable: Video Conferencing and Virtual Platform Supply and Installation

Project Size: 1M ETB

Project deliverable: Network Operation Center And Virtual Management Platform Supply

Project Size: 1M+ ETB

National Disaster and Risk Management Center

Project deliverable: Data Center, Storage and Backup & Anti-virus

Project Size: 1M ETB

Project Size: 1M+ ETB
